text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews If you did the job that the American people hired you to do then would wouldn't be America FIRST with over 500,000,000 INFECTED coronavirus people and over 22,000 American's dead. While you sit in the WHITE House, playing games with people lives. You got BLOOD ON YOUR HANDS!
